item.title: AMP Notes
item.description:
1. Never Stop the Content
2. Asset Independent Layouts
3. Inline Sizebound CSS
4. Efficient Font Triggers
5. Minimize Style Layout Recalculations
6. GPU Accelerated animations only
7. Prioritize Resource loading
